page.title: 18THE McAULAY GALLERY
page.content: {THE McAULAY GALLERY--A LOCAL AMENITY { We are lucky to live here.Although we are in the country it is not too far from Edinburgh.We can easily get into Edinburgh by train,bus or car.We go to shops,theatres,art galleries,museums and to the Edinburgh international festival which is held every year in the Autumn. However people from Edinburgh and much further afield come to our area to visit a small art gallery which is becoming quite famous. The art gallery is a pub aswell.5 years ago Mr Angus McAulay bought the pub because he loved paintings and decided it was a good location for an art gallery. Many famous people exhibit at our gallery.The paintings are good and sell well.
